name: Half-Life: A Place in the West - Chapter 4
detailed_description:
The fourth chapter of A Place in the West - A Spy in the House of Long - continues the story of New Franklin, an American enclave with a mysterious tower at its heart.



Picking up immediately after the events of the third chapter, the fallout from the Pit disaster spreads throughout the city, bringing its competing factions into conflict. Fearing a loss of power, Governor Moore acts to quell Sejal Rajani's Opposition - a group of dissenters with a radical plan for the city's future - forcing Major-General Long to resort to extreme measures to reassert control.



A Spy in the House of Long is 30 pages in length, with all new artwork, and features some of the most visually arresting scenes from the comic so far!
